title: Make TensorMethods (fastGetSet) not depend on data type of Storage.
body_html:
Currently, fastGetSet is implemented as macros that depend on the data type of Storage (i.e. that storage->data is real*). Since we are moving to having 'void*' data this won't work in the future.

Also, due to the recent C/C++ split, these are actually C++ implementations (because they require the struct definition which is C++), so we move them to a generic .hpp file and implement them as static inline functions.
